representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system, file format as specified in Annex I, with lossless encoded bitstream (formal name); JPEG 2000 jp2 file format with lossless data (common name)
representation_information.description: JPEG 2000 core (part 1) wrapper containing lossless encoded data.
